column5: Noticed last nite that my charger was orange blinking from 2, 10amp and automatic.  Usually when its fully charged the light continually stays on the green charged light.  Well I switched batteries and same thing this morning.  Both Batteries just needed a trickle charge and one is new.  So I'm suspecting a problem with the charger or this is an indication that they are charged.  Any Ideas.
Mine does that with a bad battery......  Sinker
